name: Role Shifter
description:
You are an adventurer with a unique power: Every ten seconds, you transform into a completely different role! Will you become a sword-fighting warrior next? Perhaps a fireball-shooting mage? Maybe a quick-stabbing rouge? Whatever your role, use your skills to withstand an ever-growing army of skeletons for as long as possible!

Created for the Game Maker's Toolkit Game Jam 2022. Theme: Roll of the Dice.  Made in 50 hours by one person.

Controls:

Keyboard and Mouse:

WASD - Move

Left Click or Left Ctrl - Attack

Mouse Movement - Control Camera

Controller:

Left Stick - Move

X Button or B Button - Attack

Right Stick - Control Camera

Alt + F4 to quit

Assets Used:

Character Controller Pro by Lightbug from Unity Asset Store

KayKit Dungeon, Skeleton, and Animation Packs from OpenGameArt

Fantasy Skybox FREE from Unity Asset Store

Tileable Bricks Ground Textures - Set 1 by Cethiel from OpenGameArt

Stylized Lava Textures from Unity Asset Store

Sound Effects and Music from Pixabay
